trans-unit.source: Customizes the behavior of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl"></xref> object with which the adapter is associated for specific browser requests.
trans-unit.target: 自定义的行为<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl"></xref>适配器与之关联的特定浏览器请求的对象。

trans-unit.source: A control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class is bound to a data source and generates its user interface or child control hierarchy by enumerating the items in the data source to which it is bound.
trans-unit.target: 派生的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>类绑定到数据源，并通过枚举绑定到数据源中的项来生成其用户界面或子控件层次结构。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> is an abstract base class that defines the common characteristics of all controls that can be bound to a data source, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>是一个抽象基类，用于定义可以如绑定到数据源的所有控件的常见特征<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: A DataBoundControlAdapter modifies the behavior of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> for a specific browser or class of browsers, or acts as a filter on some capability.
trans-unit.target: DataBoundControlAdapter 修改的行为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>特定浏览器或作为筛选器针对某些功能的浏览器或行为的类。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: Much of the adaptability in rendering behavior can be encapsulated in the specialized classes that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> class.
trans-unit.target: 在呈现行为适应性大部分可以封装在派生<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>类</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>的专用类

trans-unit.source: Therefore, it is likely that a single adapter can be used for a number of browser class behaviors or that inclusion of the adaptability in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> classes can make the use of a control adapter unnecessary.
trans-unit.target: 因此，很可能单个适配器可以用于大量的浏览器类行为，或者包括在适应性<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>类可以使用的控件适配器的不必要。</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>

trans-unit.source: Each control has explicit mappings to adapters through the .browser definition files, if there are `<controlAdapter>` entries in these files.
trans-unit.target: 每个控件都有显式映射到适配器穿过.browser 定义文件中，如果有`<controlAdapter>`这些文件中的条目。

trans-unit.source: Thus, any access to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Adapter%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> uses the <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> object extracted from the .browser definition files to perform the lookup for the mapping of the adapter to control.
trans-unit.target: 因此，任何访问到<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Adapter%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>使用<xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities>从适配器到控件的映射执行查找.browser 定义文件中提取的对象。</xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Adapter%2A>

trans-unit.source: During processing, the .NET Framework intercepts calls to the methods of a control that could be browser specific.
trans-unit.target: 在处理期间，.NET Framework 截获对可能是浏览器特定的控件的方法的调用。

trans-unit.source: If a control adapter is attached, the .NET Framework calls the associated adapter methods.
trans-unit.target: 如果附加了控件适配器，.NET Framework 调用关联的适配器方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter>。</xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter>

trans-unit.source: The M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter.PerformDataBinding(System.Collections.IEnumerable) method binds an enumerable collection to the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>.
trans-unit.target: M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter.PerformDataBinding(System.Collections.IEnumerable) 方法绑定到的关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>的可枚举集合

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter.Control%2A> property returns a strongly typed reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter.Control%2A>属性返回到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>强类型化的引用</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter.Control%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter> class when it creates the corresponding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter> object.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 内部构造的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter>类时它会创建相应<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a strongly-typed reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl"></xref> object associated with this control adapter.
trans-unit.target: 检索的强类型引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl"></xref>与此控件适配器关联的对象。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter> object is attached to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> control, the .NET Framework calls certain adapter members instead of the control members.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter>对象附加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>控件，.NET Framework 调用而不是控件成员某些适配器成员。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl"></xref> to which this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter"></xref> is attached.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl"> </xref>此<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter"></xref>附加。

trans-unit.source: Binds the data in the data source of the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl"></xref> object to the control adapter.
trans-unit.target: 将关联的数据源中数据绑定<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl"></xref>到控件适配器的对象。

trans-unit.source: The PerformDataBinding method is called in place of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter> control adapter is attached to a control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> class.
trans-unit.target: PerformDataBinding 方法调用来代替<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法时的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter>控件适配器所附加到控件派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>类。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Typically, an override of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A?displayProperty=fullName> iterates through data, creating distinct names and values when necessary, and saves it to an internal collection.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下的重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A?displayProperty=fullName>循环访问数据，创建不同的名称和值，如有必要，并将其保存到内部集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.PerformDataBinding%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Usually, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderContents%2A> or a similar method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> will populate the user interface or child controls from that internal collection.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderContents%2A>或类似的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>将填充用户接口或子控件从该内部集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.RenderContents%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> of <xref:System.Object> to be bound to the derived <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>的<xref:System.Object>绑定到派生<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl"> </xref>。</xref:System.Object> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>
